offline.label: Offline
offline.content: You are offline. All your data is stored on your browser only. Start your free trial to sync your data and try premium features.
expired.label: Expired
expired.content: Your license is expired. You can still use the app but you don't have access premium to features anymore.
trial.label: Free trial
trial.content: Your free trial ends in {{days}} days. Upgrade to continue using the app and access premium features.
valid.label: Premium
valid.content: You have {{days}} days left of premium license.
